com.hcl.domino.mime

Interface RichTextMimeConversionSettings

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdaptable

    public interface RichTextMimeConversionSettings
extends IAdaptable
    Settings to control the rich text to MIME conversion

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        RichTextMimeConversionSettings setAddItems(List<String> itemNames)
        The function sets the Conversions Controls 'add items setting' setting to the input value.
        Parameters:
        itemNames - item names, list of item names to preserve in msgs as they are exported (default is empty list)
        Returns:
        this instance

      • getSkipX

        boolean getSkipX()
        The function returns the Conversions Controls 'skip X-Notes-Item headers' setting.
        Returns:
        if TRUE, don't export any headers named x-notes-item (default FALSE)

      • setSkipX

        RichTextMimeConversionSettings setSkipX(boolean b)
        The function sets the Conversions Controls 'skip X-Notes-Item headers' setting to the input value.
        Parameters:
        b - if TRUE, don't export any headers named x-notes-item (default FALSE)
        Returns:
        this instance
